ygData.subject: Re: Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Killing minotaurs and clockworks does not raise faction with the vendors. Brillian ... From: Russ Gresh To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com Sent: Monday, December 27,
ygData.messageBody:
Killing minotaurs and clockworks does not raise faction with the vendors.

Brillian
----- Original Message -----
From: Russ Gresh
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, December 27, 1999 2:46 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Faction


killing minotaurs or rogue clockworks should do it

Fixer, 45 enchanter, Cazic-Thule
----- Original Message -----
From: Brian Nelson
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, December 26, 1999 10:01 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Faction


My faction with Bom Knotwood (tinkering vendor) is apprehensive. This is not so good since I buy a lot from him. I don't know how it got there, but do any of you know how I can fix this faction? All of the vendors in Ak'Anon are apprehensive to me.
Oh, and congrats Fizzwizz for making a rebreather, what is your skill and how many tries did it take you?

Brillian
